card.name: Faerie Miracle
card.text: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ If you have all civilizations in your mana zone, put another card from the top of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Child Festival of Faerie Fire
card.text: ■ Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one of them into your mana zone tapped, and the other on the bottom of your deck. If you put a fire card into your mana zone in this way, return this spell to your hand after casting it instead of putting it into your graveyard.

card.name: Esmer, Celestial Faerie/How about a cup of tea?
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, you may put one of your shields into your mana zone. ========================= ■ Shield Trigger ■ Add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. At the Step#Step 2 (Draw)

card.name: Faerie Re:Life
card.text: ■ Guard Strike ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Dondon Volcanic Now
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Put one in your mana zone, add one to your hand and put one into your graveyard. Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that costs the same as or less than the card put into your graveyard.
